title: pbe register
body:
Was Ziggs here? Something...blew up on this page. Please give it another shot later.
i just whanted to register on pbe and this heapond

replies.body:
This can usually be resolved if you first visit the [EUNE landing page](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/) to login to your account, then visit the [EUNE PBE signup page](https://pbesignup.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).

Let me know if this resolved it for you.
